se.miun.itm.input.util.sql

Class DatabaseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.miun.itm.input.util.sql.AbstractDatabaseConnector
      • se.miun.itm.input.util.sql.DatabaseAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    se.miun.itm.input.aspects.DatabaseConnector

    public class DatabaseAdapter
extends se.miun.itm.input.util.sql.AbstractDatabaseConnector
    Used for performing SQL database transactions such as export, import, updating and deletion of Document:s and Exportable:s.
    Author:
    Stefan Karlsson

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  DatabaseAdapter.DummyLock
      A dummy Lock whose methods are no-ops.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

                 java.lang.Boolean autoCommit)
                          throws se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException
        Checks whether the given Boolean is null and, if it isn't, sets the auto commit mode of the given Connection in accordance with the Boolean.
        Parameters:
        autoCommit - true if the given Connection shall be auto committing, false if it shall not be auto committing, or null if its auto commit mode shall remain unchanged.
        Throws:
        se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException - If a database error occurs.

      • delete

        public boolean delete(se.miun.itm.input.model.Document doc)
               throws se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException,
                      se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException
        Deletes the given InPUT XML document from the connected database.
        Parameters:
        doc - The InPUT XML document to be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if the deletion was successful, or false if the specified document was not in the database.
        Throws:
        se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException - If the document isn't an InPUT XML document.
        se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException - If a database error occurs.

      • delete

        public boolean delete(se.miun.itm.input.aspects.Exportable exportable)
               throws se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException,
                      se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException
        Deletes the given Exportable from the connected database.
        Parameters:
        exportable - The Exportable to be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if the deletion was successful, or false if the given Exportable was not in the database.
        Throws:
        se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException - If the Exportable isn't a design, design space, code-mapping object, experiment or IInPUT.
        se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException - If a database error occurs.

      • export

        public boolean export(se.miun.itm.input.model.Document doc)
               throws se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException,
                      se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException
        Exports the given InPUT XML document to the connected database.
        Parameters:
        doc - The InPUT XML document to be exported.
        Returns:
        true if the document was successfully exported, or false if a document with the same ID and type is already in the database.
        Throws:
        se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException - If the document isn't a design or design space document, or if it's dependent on a document that cannot be found.
        se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException - If a database error occurs.

      • export

        public boolean export(se.miun.itm.input.aspects.Exportable exportable)
               throws se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException,
                      se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException
        Exports the given Exportable to the connected database.
        Parameters:
        exportable - The Exportable to be exported.
        Returns:
        true if the Exportable was successfully exported, or false if an Exportable with the same ID and type is already in the database.
        Throws:
        se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException - If the Exportable isn't a design, design space, experiment or IInPUT, or if a non-database export error occurs.
        se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException - If a database error occurs.

        public se.miun.itm.input.model.design.IDesign importDesign(java.lang.String id)

                                                           se.miun.itm.input.model.IOInPUTException,
                                                           se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException
        Imports the specified design from the connected database.
        Parameters:
        designID - The ID of the design to be imported.
        frameworkID - The ID of the framework that the code mapping object of the design's design space belongs to, or null if it doesn't belong to any framework.
        Returns:
        The specified design if it's in the database, otherwise null.
        Throws:

      • update

        public boolean update(se.miun.itm.input.model.Document doc)
               throws se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException,
                      se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException
        Updates the specified InPUT XML document in the connected database.
        Parameters:
        doc - An InPUT XML document that has the same ID and type as the one that shall be updated and that contains the new content.
        Returns:
        true if the document was successfully updated, or false if it doesn't have the same ID and type as any of the InPUT XML documents in the database.
        Throws:
        se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException - If the document isn't an InPUT XML document, or if it's dependent on an document that cannot be found.
        se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException - If a database error occurs.

      • update

        public boolean update(se.miun.itm.input.aspects.Exportable exportable)
               throws se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException,
                      se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException
        Updates the specified Exportable in the connected database.
        Parameters:
        exportable - An Exportable that has the same ID and type as the one that shall be updated and that contains the new content.
        Returns:
        true if the Exportable was successfully updated, or false if it doesn't have the same ID and type as any of the Exportable:s in the database.
        Throws:
        se.miun.itm.input.model.InPUTException - If the Exportable isn't a design, design space, code-mapping object, experiment or IInPUT, or if it's dependent on code mappings that cannot be found.
        se.miun.itm.input.model.SQLInPUTException - If a database error occurs.
